description:
reference to a regional or national standard describing a component.
AFNOR = Association Francaise de Normalisation |ANSI = American National Standards Institute |ASTM = American Society for Testing and Materials |BEC = Belgisch Elektrotechnisch Comite |BIN = Belgisch Instituut voor Normalisatie |BSI = British Standards Institution |CSA = Canadian Standards Association |DIN = Deutsches Institut fur Normung |MIL = Military specification |NNI = Nederlands Normalisatie Instituut |UL = Underwriters Laboratories |UNE = Instituto Nacional de Racionalizacion y Normalizacion (IRANOR) |UNI = Ente Nazionale Italiona di Unificiazione.
